details.arabic_diacless: رب انى ظلمت نفسى فاغفر لى فغفر لهٗ‌ انهٗ هو الغفور الرحيم‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ اِنِّىۡ ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِىۡ فَاغۡفِرۡ لِىۡ فَغَفَرَ لَهٗ‌ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ الۡغَفُوۡرُ الرَّحِيۡمُ‏
details.transliteration: innee thalamtunafsee faghfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooruarraheem
details.translations: My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me," and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

details.arabic_diacless: قال رب بماۤ انعمت على فلن اكون ظهيرا للمجرمين‏
details.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَاۤ اَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَىَّ فَلَنۡ اَكُوۡنَ ظَهِيۡرًا لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: Qala  Rabbi bima anAAamtaAAalayya falan akoona thaheeran lilmujrimeen,
details.translations: Say: "My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals."
